Type.Name: RenderBackgroundHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RenderBackgroundHandler(object o, RenderBackgroundArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed RenderBackgroundHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RenderBackgroundHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RenderBackgroundHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RenderBackgroundHandler is removed from the event.
